header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: School subjects, physical exercise and education in school, being healthy as a teenager, rugby, Civilisation 5 computer game, Step grandads leukaemia and treatment,
header.activity: Dinner conversation about school and exercise.

speaker.occupation: not currently working, caring for toddler
